bug.author: bennythedataguy
bug.description:
org.nd4j.linalg.util.SerializationUtils org.deeplearning4j.util.SerializationUtils
This is confusing as hell. There can be only one. <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/16317063/13516767/fe46b4d0-e171-11e5-9188-cffa83cda86f.jpg></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Not ideal. But there are many many other things that are even more confusing about dl4j. Like two layer.java or the duplicate names for the conf and implementations for all the layers. For now, we are going to keep thing as they are.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
